languages.text: "Вы натягиваете на себя чужую кожу из желания показаться моложе? Издайте декрет об отмене этой мерзости. Сегодня же".
"You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."
languages.original_text: "Вы натягиваете на себя чужую кожу из желания показаться моложе? Издайте декрет об отмене этой мерзости. Сегодня же".

traits.locale_text: "You put on other people's skin out of desire to appear younger? You will declare this vile practice banned, today."
"You put on other people's skin out of desire to appear younger? You will declare this vile practice banned, today."
"You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."
"You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."
"You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."
"You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

languages.text: “为了让自己看着年轻，你们就把别人的脸剥下来，缝在自己脸上？你必须明令禁止这种卑劣的行为，今天就办。”
languages.original_text: "You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

traits.locale_text: “为了让自己看着年轻，你们就把别人的脸剥下来，缝在自己脸上？你必须明令禁止这种卑劣的行为，今天就办。”

languages.text: 「若く見せたいがために他人の皮膚をまとっているだと？今日限りでそのような忌まわしい習慣は禁止すると宣言しろ」
languages.original_text: "You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

traits.locale_text: 「若く見せたいがために他人の皮膚をまとっているだと？今日限りでそのような忌まわしい習慣は禁止すると宣言しろ」

languages.text: «¿Se ponen la piel de otras personas para parecer más jóvenes? Prohibirá esta aborrecible práctica hoy mismo».
languages.original_text: "You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se ponen la piel de otras personas para parecer más jóvenes? Prohibirá esta aborrecible práctica hoy mismo».

languages.text: "Sırf genç görünmek için başkalarının yüzünü mü alıyorsunuz? Bu iğrenç uygulamanın bugünden itibaren yasaklandığını duyuracaksın."
languages.original_text: "You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

traits.locale_text: "Sırf genç görünmek için başkalarının yüzünü mü alıyorsunuz? Bu iğrenç uygulamanın bugünden itibaren yasaklandığını duyuracaksın."

languages.text: « Vous portez la peau d'autres personnes pour paraître plus jeune ? Vous allez faire interdire cette horrible pratique aujourd'hui même ! »
languages.original_text: "You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

traits.locale_text: « Vous portez la peau d'autres personnes pour paraître plus jeune ? Vous allez faire interdire cette horrible pratique aujourd'hui même ! »

languages.text: "Ihr bedeckt Euch mit der Haut anderer Leute, um jünger auszusehen? Ihr werdet diese Praxis verbieten ... heute noch!"
languages.original_text: "You put on other people's skin out of a desire to look younger? You will declare this vile practice banned — today."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr bedeckt Euch mit der Haut anderer Leute, um jünger auszusehen? Ihr werdet diese Praxis verbieten ... heute noch!"
